Forms¶

List of django forms for accounts app.

class accounts.forms.BasicInfoForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id=u'id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None)¶

Form to change registered user basic information as in page ‘Account settings > Profile’.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

save(pk)¶

Form method to save all details into accounts.models.UserProfile model.

Parameters:pk – ID of accounts.models.UserProfile instance which is to be updated
Returns:Tuple (status, errors) - status: True if there were not errors else False, errors: dict of errors

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class accounts.forms.PasswordChangeForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id=u'id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None)¶

Form to change user password from account settings (after he has logged in).

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class accounts.forms.PasswordResetForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id=u'id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None)¶

Form to reset/recover a user’s password without login. The user has been send a verification code, using which he can set new new password now.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class accounts.forms.PrivateInfoForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id=u'id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None)¶

Form to change registered user private information as in page ‘Account settings > Profile’.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

save(pk)¶

Form method to save all details into accounts.models.UserProfile model.

Parameters:pk – ID of accounts.models.UserProfile instance which is to be updated
Returns:Tuple (status, errors) - status: True if there were not errors else False, errors: dict of errors

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class accounts.forms.RegistrationForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id=u'id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None)¶

Form for user registration. This form include basic user details enough to kickstart a user account. Nothing more than name, age, dob, gender is asked along with phone number as username.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

get_date_of_birth()¶

Returns a datetime (timezone unaware) object with time as 00:00:00.00 :return: Date of birth datetime object
